summary: Alters the Crossbows Basic Collection mod to support Better Sorting type mods.
descriptionHtml:
Did this for myself, and figured others may find it useful.

This alters the Crossbow Basic Collection mod (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23876), renaming the bolts and additional crossbows to follow the sorting style in Better Sorting by eclips3 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26558). That mod is not required, but CBC is.

This only works with the English Level List version of CBC, I\'m guessing just using Wyre Bash to change the master to the non-level list would probably work.

Basically it renames the bolts to be \"bolt - material\"
or \"bolt - material fire\"

This may work with other sorting mods, but untested.

UPDATE: I\'ve added a Crossbows Revamped version (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21666)
It\'s completely untested.

Just make sure to load my mod after the whichever original.

Tools:
Construction Kit
Wyre Bash (To add the Crossbow Basic Collection esp as a master)
author: ViperLord
